column1:
[sound:clip_001.mp3]
ヨナも一緒に行っちゃダメ
column2:
Can't Yona come along too?

Vocabulary:
• 一緒 (いっしょ) - together
• 行っちゃ (いっちゃ) - contraction of 行っては (to go)
• ダメ (だめ) - no good, not allowed

Grammar:
～ちゃダメ is a casual way to say 'must not' or 'can't' (from ～てはいけない)

column1:
[sound:clip_002.mp3]
今日は狩りをすることになると思うからやめておいた方がいいな
column2:
I think I'll end up hunting today, so you'd better stay home.

Vocabulary:
• 今日 (きょう) - today
• 狩り (かり) - hunting
• 思う (おもう) - to think
• やめておく (やめておく) - to refrain from, to not do
• 方がいい (ほうがいい) - had better, should

Grammar:
～ことになる indicates something that will come about/be decided

column1:
[sound:clip_003.mp3]
帰りにまたヨナの好きそうな本を借りてきてやるから
column2:
I'll borrow a book you might like on my way back.

Vocabulary:
• 帰り (かえり) - on the way back, return
• また (また) - again
• 好き (すき) - to like
• 本 (ほん) - book
• 借りる (かりる) - to borrow
• ～てくる (てくる) - to go and come back (with something)

Grammar:
～てやる is casual for doing something for someone (usually younger/lower status); ～そうな means 'seems like, looks like'

column1:
[sound:clip_004.mp3]
ありがとうヨナ待ってる
column2:
Thank you! Yona will be waiting!

Vocabulary:
• ありがとう (ありがとう) - thank you
• 待つ (まつ) - to wait
• 待ってる (まってる) - waiting (contraction of 待っている)

column1:
[sound:clip_005.mp3]
じゃあ行ってくるよ
column2:
Alright, I'm heading out.

Vocabulary:
• じゃあ (じゃあ) - well then, alright
• 行ってくる (いってくる) - to go and come back

Grammar:
行ってくる is the standard phrase when leaving home (implying you'll return)

column1:
[sound:clip_006.mp3]
ホポルさんのいる図書館に行かなきゃ
column2:
I need to go to the library where Popola is.

Vocabulary:
• いる (いる) - to be (for people/animals)
• 図書館 (としょかん) - library
• 行く (いく) - to go
• ～なきゃ (なきゃ) - must, have to (casual)

Grammar:
～なきゃ is casual contraction of ～なければならない (must do)

column1:
[sound:clip_007.mp3]
おはよう / 最近ヨナちゃんの調子はどう?
column2:
Good morning. / How has Yona been doing lately?

Vocabulary:
• おはよう (おはよう) - good morning (casual)
• 最近 (さいきん) - recently, lately
• 調子 (ちょうし) - condition, state
• どう (どう) - how

column1:
[sound:clip_008.mp3]
相変わらず席が止まらないんです / そう心配ね
column2:
Her coughing still won't stop. / I see, that's worrying.

Vocabulary:
• 相変わらず (あいかわらず) - as always, still, as usual
• 咳 (せき) - cough (transcribed as 席)
• 止まる (とまる) - to stop
• 心配 (しんぱい) - worry, concern

Grammar:
～んです adds explanation/emphasis. Note: 席 is a transcription error for 咳 (cough)

column1:
[sound:clip_009.mp3]
少しでもヨナが元気になればいいんだけど
column2:
I just wish Yona could get even a little better...

Vocabulary:
• 少し (すこし) - a little
• 少しでも (すこしでも) - even a little, even slightly
• 元気 (げんき) - healthy, energetic, well
• なる (なる) - to become

Grammar:
～ばいいんだけど expresses a wish that may be difficult to fulfill

column1:
[sound:clip_010.mp3]
僕には何もできない / そんなことないわ
column2:
There's nothing I can do... / That's not true.

Vocabulary:
• 僕 (ぼく) - I (male, casual)
• 何も (なにも) - nothing (with negative verb)
• できる (できる) - can do, to be able to
• そんなこと (そんなこと) - such a thing, that

Grammar:
そんなことない is used to deny/refute what someone said

column1:
[sound:clip_011.mp3]
あなたは立派なお兄ちゃんよ / そうだ
column2:
You're a wonderful big brother. / Oh, that's right.

Vocabulary:
• あなた (あなた) - you
• 立派 (りっぱ) - splendid, admirable, fine
• お兄ちゃん (おにいちゃん) - big brother (affectionate)
• そうだ (そうだ) - that's right, oh yes

column1:
[sound:clip_012.mp3]
今日はこれを頼みたいんだけれど / 商店街から仕事の依頼があったの
column2:
I'd like to ask you something today. / There's a job request from the shopping district.

Vocabulary:
• これ (これ) - this
• 頼む (たのむ) - to request, to ask
• 商店街 (しょうてんがい) - shopping district/street
• 仕事 (しごと) - job, work
• 依頼 (いらい) - request, commission

Grammar:
～たいんだけれど is a polite way to express wanting to ask something

column1:
[sound:clip_013.mp3]
北平原の羊から肉を取ってきてほしいそうよ / わかったすぐ行くよ
column2:
They want you to get meat from the sheep in the Northern Plains. / Got it, I'll go right away.

Vocabulary:
• 北平原 (きたへいげん) - Northern Plains
• 羊 (ひつじ) - sheep
• 肉 (にく) - meat
• 取る (とる) - to take, to get
• わかった (わかった) - understood, got it
• すぐ (すぐ) - immediately, right away

Grammar:
～てほしい expresses wanting someone to do something; ～そうよ is feminine hearsay

column1:
[sound:clip_014.mp3]
北平原に行くなら地図を持って行って
column2:
If you're going to the Northern Plains, take a map with you.

Vocabulary:
• 地図 (ちず) - map
• 持つ (もつ) - to hold, to have
• 持っていく (もっていく) - to take (with you)

Grammar:
～なら is a conditional meaning 'if (that's the case)'

column1:
[sound:clip_015.mp3]
必ず役に立つわ
column2:
It will definitely be useful.

Vocabulary:
• 必ず (かならず) - definitely, certainly, always
• 役に立つ (やくにたつ) - to be useful, to be helpful

column1:
[sound:clip_016.mp3]
それから / ついでに依頼の人から薬草を3個買ってきてもらえる
column2:
Also... / While you're at it, could you buy 3 medicinal herbs from the requester?

Vocabulary:
• それから (それから) - and then, also
• ついでに (ついでに) - while you're at it, incidentally
• 依頼 (いらい) - request, commission
• 薬草 (やくそう) - medicinal herb
• 3個 (さんこ) - 3 items
• 買う (かう) - to buy

Grammar:
～てもらえる is a polite request form (could you do... for me?)

column1:
[sound:clip_017.mp3]
ちょうど切らしちゃって
column2:
We just ran out.

Vocabulary:
• ちょうど (ちょうど) - just, exactly
• 切らす (きらす) - to run out of, to be out of stock

Grammar:
～ちゃって is casual form of ～てしまって (unfortunately did, regrettably)

column1:
[sound:clip_018.mp3]
はいこれがお金よ
column2:
Here, this is the money.

Vocabulary:
• はい (はい) - here (when handing something)
• お金 (おかね) - money

column1:
[sound:clip_019.mp3]
こんなにいっぱいお金が余っちゃうよ
column2:
This is way too much money, there'll be a lot left over!

Vocabulary:
• こんなに (こんなに) - this much, so much
• いっぱい (いっぱい) - a lot, full, many
• お金 (おかね) - money
• 余る (あまる) - to be left over, to remain
• ～ちゃう (ちゃう) - casual form of ～てしまう (end up doing)

column1:
[sound:clip_020.mp3]
余ったらヨナちゃんへの薬草でも買ってあげなさい
column2:
If there's any left over, buy some herbs for Yona.

Vocabulary:
• 余る (あまる) - to be left over
• 薬草 (やくそう) - medicinal herb
• ～でも (でも) - or something, even
• 買ってあげる (かってあげる) - to buy for someone

Grammar:
～てあげなさい is a gentle command to do something for someone; ～たら is conditional (if)

column1:
[sound:clip_021.mp3]
それは
column2:
That's...

Vocabulary:
• それ (それ) - that

column1:
[sound:clip_022.mp3]
お願いね
column2:
Please do.

Vocabulary:
• お願い (おねがい) - request, please

Grammar:
お願いね is a soft/feminine way to say please

column1:
[sound:clip_023.mp3]
いつもありがとうポポルさん
column2:
Thank you as always, Popola.

Vocabulary:
• いつも (いつも) - always
• ありがとう (ありがとう) - thank you

column1:
[sound:clip_024.mp3]
急にどうしたの / 身寄りのない僕ら兄弟を気にかけてくれて
column2:
What's this all of a sudden? / For looking after us siblings who have no family.

Vocabulary:
• 急に (きゅうに) - suddenly
• どうしたの (どうしたの) - what's wrong?, what happened?
• 身寄り (みより) - relatives, family
• 僕ら (ぼくら) - we, us (male casual)
• 兄弟 (きょうだい) - siblings
• 気にかける (きにかける) - to care about, to worry about
• ～てくれる (てくれる) - to do (something) for me/us

Grammar:
身寄りのない means 'without relatives/family'

column1:
[sound:clip_025.mp3]
僕らポポルさんや村の人にはとても感謝してるんです
column2:
We're very grateful to you and the villagers, Popola.

Vocabulary:
• 村 (むら) - village
• 人 (ひと) - person, people
• とても (とても) - very
• 感謝 (かんしゃ) - gratitude, appreciation
• ～してる (してる) - doing (contraction of している)

column1:
[sound:clip_026.mp3]
困った時はお互い様よ
column2:
We help each other in times of trouble.

Vocabulary:
• 困る (こまる) - to be troubled, to be in difficulty
• 困った時 (こまったとき) - when in trouble
• お互い様 (おたがいさま) - we're in the same boat, mutual, it works both ways

Grammar:
お互い様 is a set phrase meaning 'it's mutual' or 'we help each other'

column1:
[sound:clip_027.mp3]
みんな早くヨナちゃんの元気な姿が見たいのよ
column2:
Everyone wants to see Yona healthy again soon.

Vocabulary:
• みんな (みんな) - everyone
• 早く (はやく) - soon, quickly
• 元気 (げんき) - healthy, energetic
• 姿 (すがた) - figure, appearance, form
• 見たい (みたい) - want to see

column1:
[sound:clip_028.mp3]
だから頑張ってねお兄ちゃん
column2:
So hang in there, big brother.

Vocabulary:
• だから (だから) - so, therefore
• 頑張る (がんばる) - to do one's best, to hang in there
• 頑張って (がんばって) - hang in there, good luck, do your best
• お兄ちゃん (おにいちゃん) - big brother

column1:
[sound:clip_029.mp3]
うんわかった
column2:
Yeah, got it.

Vocabulary:
• うん (うん) - yeah (casual)
• わかった (わかった) - understood, got it

column1:
[sound:clip_030.mp3]
ヨナ / あ、お兄ちゃん / ダメじゃないか、ちゃんと家で寝てなきゃ
column2:
Yona! / Oh, big brother! / You shouldn't be out here, you need to stay home and rest!

Vocabulary:
• ダメ (だめ) - no good, not allowed
• ちゃんと (ちゃんと) - properly
• 家 (いえ) - house, home
• 寝る (ねる) - to sleep, to lie down
• ～なきゃ (なきゃ) - must (casual)

Grammar:
ダメじゃないか is a mild scolding expression (isn't it no good?)

column1:
[sound:clip_031.mp3]
ほら、服のリボンもほどけてるぞ
column2:
Look, your ribbon has come undone too.

Vocabulary:
• ほら (ほら) - look, see
• 服 (ふく) - clothes
• リボン (りぼん) - ribbon
• ほどける (ほどける) - to come undone, to unravel

Grammar:
～てるぞ is masculine casual for ～ている (ongoing state)

column1:
[sound:clip_032.mp3]
ごめんなさい
column2:
I'm sorry.

Vocabulary:
• ごめんなさい (ごめんなさい) - I'm sorry

column1:
[sound:clip_033.mp3]
でもヨナね、病気を早く治す方法を探してたの
column2:
But Yona was looking for a way to get better quickly.

Vocabulary:
• でも (でも) - but
• 病気 (びょうき) - illness, sickness
• 早く (はやく) - quickly, soon
• 治す (なおす) - to cure, to heal
• 方法 (ほうほう) - method, way
• 探す (さがす) - to search for, to look for
• ～てた (てた) - was doing (casual past progressive)

column1:
[sound:clip_034.mp3]
ヨナ、大丈夫、ヨナは心配しなくてもいいんだよ
column2:
Yona, it's okay. You don't need to worry.

Vocabulary:
• 大丈夫 (だいじょうぶ) - alright, okay, fine
• 心配 (しんぱい) - worry
• 心配する (しんぱいする) - to worry

Grammar:
～なくてもいい means 'don't have to', 'no need to'

column1:
[sound:clip_035.mp3]
いっぱい食べてよく寝たら、ちゃんとよくなるから / 本当?
column2:
If you eat lots and sleep well, you'll definitely get better. / Really?

Vocabulary:
• いっぱい (いっぱい) - a lot, lots
• 食べる (たべる) - to eat
• よく (よく) - well
• 寝る (ねる) - to sleep
• ちゃんと (ちゃんと) - properly, certainly
• よくなる (よくなる) - to get better
• 本当 (ほんとう) - really, truly

Grammar:
～たら is a conditional (if/when)

column1:
[sound:clip_036.mp3]
もちろん / それじゃあお兄ちゃんは仕事に行くから
column2:
Of course. / Well then, big brother has to go to work.

Vocabulary:
• もちろん (もちろん) - of course
• それじゃあ (それじゃあ) - well then
• 仕事 (しごと) - work, job
• 行く (いく) - to go

column1:
[sound:clip_037.mp3]
おとなしく家に帰るんだぞ
column2:
Be good and go home, okay?

Vocabulary:
• おとなしく (おとなしく) - obediently, quietly, like a good child
• 家 (いえ) - home
• 帰る (かえる) - to return, to go home

Grammar:
～んだぞ is a masculine emphatic command/instruction

column1:
[sound:clip_038.mp3]
今減り続ける人口と / 蔓延する奇病が / 世界を悩ませているらしい
column2:
The continuously declining population / and the spreading strange disease / seem to be plaguing the world.

Vocabulary:
• 今 (いま) - now
• 減る (へる) - to decrease, to decline
• 続ける (つづける) - to continue
• 人口 (じんこう) - population
• 蔓延 (まんえん) - spread (of disease), epidemic
• 奇病 (きびょう) - strange/mysterious disease
• 世界 (せかい) - world
• 悩ませる (なやませる) - to trouble, to plague

Grammar:
～続ける means 'to continue to ~'; ～らしい indicates hearsay (I hear that)

column1:
[sound:clip_039.mp3]
魔物と呼ばれる黒い化け物も / 人々の生活を脅かすようになってきた
column2:
Black monsters called 'Shades' / have also started threatening people's lives.

Vocabulary:
• 魔物 (まもの) - demon, monster (Shade)
• 呼ばれる (よばれる) - to be called
• 黒い (くろい) - black
• 化け物 (ばけもの) - monster
• 人々 (ひとびと) - people
• 生活 (せいかつ) - life, livelihood
• 脅かす (おびやかす) - to threaten

Grammar:
～ようになってきた means 'has come to ~', 'has started to ~' (gradual change)

column1:
[sound:clip_040.mp3]
でも僕にとって気がかりなことはただ一つ
column2:
But for me, there's only one thing that worries me.

Vocabulary:
• でも (でも) - but
• 僕 (ぼく) - I (male)
• 気がかり (きがかり) - worry, concern, anxiety
• こと (こと) - thing, matter
• ただ (ただ) - only, just
• 一つ (ひとつ) - one

Grammar:
～にとって means 'for (someone)', 'from (someone's) perspective'

column1:
[sound:clip_041.mp3]
妹のヨナと一緒に / 今日をちゃんと生き延びられるかどうか
column2:
Whether my sister Yona and I / can properly survive another day.

Vocabulary:
• 妹 (いもうと) - younger sister
• 一緒に (いっしょに) - together
• 今日 (きょう) - today
• ちゃんと (ちゃんと) - properly
• 生き延びる (いきのびる) - to survive
• ～られる (られる) - can, able to (potential)

Grammar:
～かどうか means 'whether or not'

column1:
[sound:clip_042.mp3]
子供だけで生きていくのは色々大変だけど
column2:
Living as just children is hard in many ways, but...

Vocabulary:
• 子供 (こども) - child/children
• だけ (だけ) - only, just
• 生きていく (いきていく) - to go on living, to make a living
• 色々 (いろいろ) - various, many ways
• 大変 (たいへん) - difficult, tough, hard

column1:
[sound:clip_043.mp3]
優しい人の多いこの村でなら / なんとかやっていける気がする
column2:
In this village with so many kind people / I feel like we can somehow manage.

Vocabulary:
• 優しい (やさしい) - kind, gentle
• 人 (ひと) - person, people
• 多い (おおい) - many
• 村 (むら) - village
• なんとか (なんとか) - somehow, one way or another
• やっていく (やっていく) - to get by, to manage
• 気がする (きがする) - to feel like, to have a feeling

Grammar:
～気がする means 'I feel like ~', 'I have a sense that ~'

column1:
[sound:clip_044.mp3]
いややっていかなくちゃならないんだ / 世のためにも
column2:
No, we have to make it work. / For Yona's sake too.

Vocabulary:
• いや (いや) - no, well (self-correction)
• やっていく (やっていく) - to get by, to manage
• ため (ため) - sake, benefit

Grammar:
～なくちゃならない means 'must do'. Note: 世 may be mistranscription of ヨナ

column1:
[sound:clip_045.mp3]
羊の肉は集まったし村に戻ろう
column2:
I've gathered the sheep meat, let's head back to the village.

Vocabulary:
• 羊 (ひつじ) - sheep
• 肉 (にく) - meat
• 集まる (あつまる) - to gather, to collect
• 村 (むら) - village
• 戻る (もどる) - to return, to go back

Grammar:
～し indicates a reason (since...); ～よう is volitional (let's)

column1:
[sound:clip_046.mp3]
さあ魔物がこんなところにも
column2:
Whoa, there are Shades even in a place like this!

Vocabulary:
• さあ (さあ) - whoa, wow (surprise)
• 魔物 (まもの) - Shade, monster
• こんな (こんな) - like this, such
• ところ (ところ) - place

Grammar:
～にも means 'even in/at'

column1:
[sound:clip_047.mp3]
魔物が村のこんな近くに現れるなんて
column2:
I can't believe Shades appeared so close to the village...

Vocabulary:
• 魔物 (まもの) - Shade, monster
• 村 (むら) - village
• 近く (ちかく) - nearby, close
• 現れる (あらわれる) - to appear

Grammar:
～なんて expresses surprise or disbelief

column1:
[sound:clip_048.mp3]
安心して帰りにも行けないな / お店の人に肉を届けに行かないと
column2:
Can't even go home in peace... / I need to deliver the meat to the shop.

Vocabulary:
• 安心 (あんしん) - peace of mind, relief
• 安心して (あんしんして) - with peace of mind
• 帰り (かえり) - return, way home
• 行く (いく) - to go
• お店 (おみせ) - shop, store
• 届ける (とどける) - to deliver

Grammar:
～ないと is short for ～ないといけない (must do)

column1:
[sound:clip_049.mp3]
羊の肉集めてきたよ / 助かったよ
column2:
I've gathered the sheep meat. / That's a big help!

Vocabulary:
• 羊 (ひつじ) - sheep
• 肉 (にく) - meat
• 集める (あつめる) - to collect, to gather
• ～てくる (てくる) - to go and do (and come back)
• 助かる (たすかる) - to be saved, to be helped

Grammar:
助かった is a common way to thank someone for help

column1:
[sound:clip_050.mp3]
偶然の羊肉ブームでね / これ少ないけど取っておいてくれ
column2:
There's been a sudden mutton boom. / Here, it's not much, but keep this.

Vocabulary:
• 偶然 (ぐうぜん) - coincidence, by chance, sudden
• 羊肉 (ようにく) - mutton, lamb meat
• ブーム (ぶーむ) - boom, trend
• 少ない (すくない) - few, little, not much
• 取っておく (とっておく) - to keep, to save, to set aside

column1:
[sound:clip_051.mp3]
あとポポルさんにもお礼を伝えておいてくれるから
column2:
Also, please pass my thanks to Popola.

Vocabulary:
• あと (あと) - also, and
• お礼 (おれい) - thanks, gratitude
• 伝える (つたえる) - to convey, to tell, to pass on

Grammar:
～ておく means 'to do in advance/preparation'

column1:
[sound:clip_052.mp3]
うん伝えておくね
column2:
Sure, I'll let her know.

Vocabulary:
• うん (うん) - yeah (casual)
• 伝える (つたえる) - to tell, to convey

Grammar:
～ておく means 'to do in advance/preparation'

column1:
[sound:clip_053.mp3]
